Task - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.applicationvm
The class Task represents a task to be run on a processor core for an Application VM.

TaskI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.software.applicationvm.interfaces
The interface TaskI is used to define tasks exchanged between Application VM components and Processor components to execute requests.
